name: RPG Slasher
description:
RPG Slasher is a mixture of classic Top-Down-RPG and side-scrolling Hack'n'Slash. It's my submission to the LOWREZJAM 2019. I also combined it with the A Game By Its Cover Jam.

It is just a very early prototype. There were many more things and features planned, but as you know, you always run out of time :P

You go on an adventure, fight and slash enemies, level up, upgrade your equipment and slash! I still hope you have fun with this.

Controls:

Arrow keys: Moving
Space:  Action/Attack
Q:  Take Potion
ESC:  Back/Cancel
